personal_info.name: Khoa (Ethan) Duong
personal_info.career_objective: I have over 3 years of experience in UX/UI Design and am currently pursuing a Master of Business Analytics. My goal is to become an expert in combining design and data analysis to help businesses develop products based on deep user behavior insights and real data.

education.institution: University of Finance - Marketing - HCMC, Vietnam

key_achievements: Designed 8+ high-fidelity digital products including web and mobile applications
Reduced client project timelines by 20% through optimized design workflows
Maintained 95%+ client satisfaction rate with repeat business from 60% of clients
star_points: S: Diverse clients from fintech, e-commerce, and SaaS sectors requiring high-quality mobile apps and web interfaces with complex user experience needs and tight delivery deadlines.

T: Responsible for the end-to-end product design process (discovery, research, wireframing, prototyping, high-fidelity design) focusing on usability, conversion optimization, and accessibility standards.
A: Led UX consultations with stakeholders, conducted user research and competitive analysis, created comprehensive design systems, user flows, journey maps, and interactive prototypes in Figma.
R: Established strong market reputation through high-prestige deliverables; maintained stable, long-term relationships with 15+ clients and generated consistent revenue growth.

key_achievements: Designed and implemented comprehensive design system reducing design-to-development time by 30%
Led UX research initiatives that improved product engagement metrics by 25%
Managed design projects across 5+ product features simultaneously
star_points: S: High-growth SaaS company needed to optimize complex product journeys, establish visual consistency, and scale design operations while maintaining quality and cross-team collaboration.
T: Designed responsive landing pages (conversion-focused), built shared design system with 100+ components, established design processes and documentation for team scalability.

A: Conducted comprehensive UX research including user interviews, usability testing, and A/B testing; collaborated with product, engineering, and marketing teams; created design specifications and handoff documentation; mentored junior designers.

R: Became primary design resource for product team; earned high trust from leadership and customers; design system adoption rate reached 95% across all products; contributed to 40% increase in customer satisfaction scores.

key_achievements: Designed 6 complex enterprise applications with focus on usability and efficiency
Trained and mentored 3 junior designers, all contributing to live projects
Achieved 100% on-time project delivery across all assignments
star_points: S: Enterprise software development company working on logic-heavy applications and business platforms required interfaces that balanced complex functionality with excellent user experience for non-technical end users.
T: Designed complex logic interfaces for enterprise applications, coordinated closely with developers for accurate implementation, established design best practices and documentation standards.

A: Acted as design consultant for stakeholder meetings and requirements gathering; guided 3 interns on design tools (Figma, Adobe Creative Suite), design thinking methodologies, user research techniques, and feedback incorporation; created reusable UI components and patterns.

R: Successfully launched 6 applications with zero critical UX issues in production; all interns gained hands-on experience contributing to real client deliverables; established foundational design practices adopted by the team post-engagement.
